title: Academy Awards nominations in 2020 , by film
summary: In general Number of nominations has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of nominations is slightly increasing from Jojo_Rabbit to Joker, and lastly slightly decreasing from Joker to Little_Women.
The line significantly increased by 5.0 from Year Jojo_Rabbit to Joker.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year Jojo_Rabbit and Joker.
Maximum Number of nominations, about 11.0 was reported at Year Joker
Minimum Number of nominations about 6.0 was reached at Year Jojo_Rabbit, and Little_Women
